Ingredients.1: 1 olive oil cooking spray (such as PAM®)

Ingredients.2: 4  unsalted matzo boards, or more to taste

Ingredients.4: 1 cup light brown sugar, firmly packed

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil; spray with cooking spray.

Directions.3: Arrange matzo to fit into pan; break boards if necessary.

Directions.4: Combine butter and brown sugar together in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly until boiling; boil for about 3 minutes.

Directions.5: Pour butter mixture evenly over matzo.

Directions.6: Place the baking sheet in the preheated oven and immediately reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.7: Bake for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) if the matzo are smoking too much.

Directions.8: Remove baking sheet from oven and sprinkle matzo with chocolate chips. Let stand to melt chocolate, 5 minutes.

Directions.9: Spread the melted chocolate over matzo. Place in refrigerator until chilled and set. Break into pieces when cooled.
